title: Firecrackers, M80's and Black Bombs, Oh My!
itunes:title: Firecrackers, M80's and Black Bombs, Oh My!
description: With the Fourth of July falling on a Saturday this year, we are recording the show live today. On the show we will discuss the histroy of the M80, Firecracker from LFD, United Firecracker and the Black Bomb. We will also discuss in detail the Editorial Dave shared on Monday about cigar names and share with you the best an worst Cigar Brand names EVER!All that and the usual madness, rumors and teasing on The Cigar Authority. ﻿
